name: Blood Hag
description: The Blood Hag is a medium-sized fey with an unsettling presence, characterized by her two claws, sharp teeth, and a wild mane embodying her chaotic nature. She is known for her bloodthirsty demeanor, often shown in her combat techniques that revolve around grappling and draining life from her foes.
memorable: Her ability to drain blood and curse her enemies makes her a unique and terrifying opponent, particularly with her stunning Face Peel ability.
goals: The Blood Hag seeks to drain life from her adversaries and manipulate them for her own chaotic purposes.
relations: Blood Hags often associate with other dark fey creatures and may serve as subordinates to more powerful entities within the fey realm.
environment: Typically found in dark forests or cursed areas, often near sources of blood or conflict.
strengths: With high strength and constitution, she is tough to defeat in combat, able to endure and inflict significant damage.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and can be hindered by swift attacks that negate her grappling.
attacks: The Blood Hag employs a mix of melee and spell attacks, dealing slashing and necrotic damage, while her blood-draining abilities allow her to recover health.
most_powerful_ability: Sanguine Curse, which incapacities a foe and inflicts ongoing necrotic damage while they struggle to break free from the curse.
senses: Possesses Blood Sense, allowing her to detect living creatures within 60 feet and sense their direction up to 1 mile away.
skills: Skilled in Deception, Intimidation, Perception, and Stealth, showcasing her proficiency in manipulation and stealth tactics.
additional_information: Immune to being charmed or poisoned.
Can cast spells like Disguise Self and Modify Memory, enhancing her deceptive capabilities.
Her claws can grapple creatures, making them easier prey for her blood-draining abilities.
Can stun opponents with her Face Peel ability, further hindering their combat effectiveness.
High passive perception allows her to notice unseen threats.
spellcasting: Casts spells like Disguise Self, Knock, and Tongues at will; can also cast Modify Memory and Pass Without Trace three times a day.
